```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(collapse = TRUE, warnings = FALSE, echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
data <- read.csv(file = "heart.csv", sep = ",")

head(data, 3)

dim(data)
```

```{r}
sapply(data, class)
```

```{r}
names(data)[names(data) == 'Ã¯..age'] <- 'age'
```

```{r}
data <- transform(
  data,
  age=as.integer(age),
  sex=as.factor(sex),
  cp=as.factor(cp),
  trestbps=as.integer(trestbps),
  chol=as.integer(chol),
  fbs=as.factor(fbs),
  restecg=as.factor(restecg),
  thalach=as.integer(thalach),
  exang=as.factor(exang),
  oldpeak=as.numeric(oldpeak),
  slope=as.factor(slope),
  ca=as.factor(ca),
  thal=as.factor(thal),
  target=as.factor(target)
)
```

```{r}
sapply(data, class)
```

```{r}
data[ data == "?"] <- NA
colSums(is.na(data))
```

```{r}
data$thal[which(is.na(data$thal))] <- as.factor("3.0")
data <- data[!(data$ca %in% c(NA)),]
colSums(is.na(data))
```

```{r}
summary(data)
```

```{r}
data[data[, "cp"] == NA, "cp"] <- 4
```
